com.example.loginscreen

Class AttendanceCustomGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.example.loginscreen.AttendanceCustomGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class AttendanceCustomGrid
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    Sets up the custom grid for the attendance objects of all the dates for a given class. This is used in the AttendanceViewer activity.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int[] attendedStudents
      Is a number of attended students for every class in an array.
      private java.lang.String[] date
      Is the dates of each of the different attendance objects.
      private android.content.Context mContext
      Is the context of the view used, it is of AttendanceViewer
      private int[] possibleStudents
      Is the number of all students in a class at a given time.

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

                            int[] attend,

                            java.lang.String[] tmpDate)
        Initializes the variables
        Parameters:
        c - the context of the view
        attend - array number of the students atttended for each attendance object.
        possible - an array of numbers of the students in each class for a given attendance object.
        tmpDate - an array of dates for each attendance object.

      • getView

        public android.view.View getView(int position,
                                 android.view.View convertView,
                                 android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Sets up each card in the grid view.
        Parameters:
        position - is the position of the card being set.
        convertView - is the converted view of the original card.
        parent - is the parent of the grid's individual card.
